name: Me And My Bat
description:
Description
Bring granny the medicine she needs are  protect her from enemies to keep her alive.

Controls
A/D | D-Pad | Analog - move left/right
Spacebar | Bottom Face Button - jump
S | D-Pad | Analog + Spacebar | Bottom Face Button - drop down
LMB | Left Face Button - attack

Gameplay

Credits
